formatDescription: dBASE is a database management systems for personal computers. The dBASE system includes the core database engine, a query system, a forms engine, and a programming language that ties all of these components together. The wfm file stores the dBASE form, used for entering and modifying data in the database.
provenanceCompoundName: National Library of Australia / National Library of Australia
